revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=BeagleBoard.org |model=BeagleBoard |revision=(rev C3) |price=95 |est_release_date=05/2009 |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=OMAP3530 |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29C2G48MAKLCJI-6 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT29C2G48MAKLCJI-6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SD Card slot, |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, P2 |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1),, P9 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=USB Peripheral Power Management;Texas Instruments;TPS2141;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TPS73701;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC2G07;;1;,,, Integrated Power Management and Audio Codec;TI;TPS65950;;1;,,, 1A Power-Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2061;;1;,,, 1.8V 12Mhz USB Transceiver;Microchip;USB3326A-GL-TR;;1;,,, 1.8V 19.2Mhz USB Transceiver;Microchip;USB3322A-GL-TR;;1;,,, Flat-panel Display Digital Transmitter;TI;TFP410PAP;;1;,,, 2-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXS0102DCUR;;2;,,, 3V to 5.5V Single Channel RS232 Transceiver;TI;SN65C3221;;1; |flags=S-Video out, DVI-D, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.01 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.28;Angstrom |default_user=root |default_pass=''blank'' }} :[https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard Product page]
*[https://elinux.org/Beagleboard:BeagleBoard ''BeagleBoard'' on '''eLinux'''] (Rev B7/C2/C3/C4/C5/D)
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[TI]] OMAP3530 @720MHz (ARM Cortex-A8) Processor *RAM: 256MB, 2D/3D graphics accelerator *Connectivity: 2x USB 2.0 ports (Mini-B OTG,Type A HOST) :MMC/SD Card slot, DVI-D, S-Video
The board can be powered by 2 different methods: *5V/2A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Mini-B (when powered via USB :the 1x USB Type A ports will not function) {{see also|List of SBCs}}
===See also=== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
